subject: Kentucky Derby
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Preakness Stakes
Belmont Stakes
Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Jim Tafel, who owns and bred Street Sense, Saturday’s Kentucky Derby winner, defied the staggering odds. Now he can think about the Triple Crown.
snippet: Jim Tafel, who owns and bred Street Sense, Saturday’s Kentucky Derby winner, defied the staggering odds. Now he can think about the Triple Crown.
